welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Missaglia, a charming town known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and indulge in all the city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time in our lovely town!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 1, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours per day.
